remote_requester.name: remote_requester
remote_requester.validation_error_text: Parameter remote_requester only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

external_identifier.name: external_identifier
external_identifier.validation_error_text: Parameter external_identifier only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

remove_time.name: remove_time
remove_time.description: The time the circuit should be removed from the network in epoch time format. -1 means never.
remove_time.validation_error_text: Parameter remove_time only accepts integer numbers.

node.name: node
node.description: Array of nodes to be used.
node.validation_error_text: Parameter node only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

state.name: state
state.validation_error_text: Parameter state only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

mac_address.name: mac_address
mac_address.description: Array of mac address of endpoints for static mac circuits.
mac_address.validation_error_text: Parameter mac_address only accepts valid MAC addresses using either a : or a - as delimiter.

remote_url.name: remote_url
remote_url.description: The remote URL for the IDC
remote_url.validation_error_text: Parameter remote_url only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

interface.name: interface
interface.description: Array of interfaces to be used. Note that interface[0] is on node[0].
interface.validation_error_text: Parameter interface only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

tag.name: tag
tag.description: An array of vlan tags to be used on each interface. Note that tag[0] is on interface[0] and tag[1] is on interface[1].
tag.validation_error_text: Parameter tag only accepts integer numbers.

loop_node.name: loop_node
loop_node.description: The node to be included when the circuit is looped.
loop_node.validation_error_text: Parameter loop_node only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

provision_time.name: provision_time
provision_time.description: Timestamp of when circuit should be created in epoch time format. -1 means now.
provision_time.validation_error_text: Parameter provision_time only accepts integer numbers.

endpoint.name: endpoint
endpoint.description: Array of interfaces to be used. Note that interface[0] is on node[0].
endpoint.validation_error_text: Parameter endpoint only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

circuit_id.name: circuit_id
circuit_id.description: -1 or undefined indicate circuit is to be added.
circuit_id.validation_error_text: Parameter circuit_id only accepts integer numbers.

static_mac.name: static_mac
static_mac.description: Specifies if a circuit to beprovisioned is static_mac or not. Default is ‘0’.
static_mac.validation_error_text: Parameter static_mac only accepts either 0 or 1 for false or true values, respectively.

link.name: link
link.description: Array of names of links to be used in the primary path.
link.validation_error_text: Parameter link only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

inner_tag.name: inner_tag
inner_tag.description: An array of inner vlan tags to be used on each interface. Note that inner tag[0] is on interface[0] and inner tag[1] is on interface[1].
inner_tag.validation_error_text: Parameter inner_tag only accepts integer numbers.

workgroup_id.name: workgroup_id
workgroup_id.description: The workgroup_id with permission to build the circuit, the user must be a member of this workgroup.
workgroup_id.validation_error_text: Parameter workgroup_id only accepts integer numbers.

description.name: description
description.validation_error_text: Parameter description only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

remote_node.name: remote_node
remote_node.description: Array of OSCARS URNs to use as endpoints for IDC based circuits.
remote_node.validation_error_text: Parameter remote_node only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

bandwidth.name: bandwidth
bandwidth.description: The dedicated bandwidth of the circuit in Mbps.
bandwidth.validation_error_text: Parameter bandwidth only accepts integer numbers.

restore_to_primary.name: restore_to_primary
restore_to_primary.description: Time in minutes to restore to primary (setting to 0 disables restore to primary).
restore_to_primary.validation_error_text: Parameter restore_to_primary only accepts integer numbers.

backup_link.name: backup_link
backup_link.description: Array of names of links to be used in the backup path.
backup_link.validation_error_text: Parameter backup_link only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

endpoint_mac_address_num.name: endpoint_mac_address_num
endpoint_mac_address_num.description: Array of mac address of endpoints for static mac circuits.
endpoint_mac_address_num.validation_error_text: Parameter endpoint_mac_address_num only accepts integer numbers.

remote_tag.name: remote_tag
remote_tag.description: VLAN tags to be used on the IDC endpoints.
remote_tag.validation_error_text: Parameter remote_tag only accepts integer numbers.

name: provision_circuit
description: Adds or modifies a circuit on the network
